Mitigation.Textual:
The following cipher suites were added to the server configuration:{add}
Remove the following cipher suites from the server configuration:{remove}
Mitigation.Apache: These elements are managed by the SSLCipherSuite directive, with ':' serving as separator, '-' used to disable and '!' to kill an element (e.g., -ELEMENT, !ELEMENT)
Mitigation.nginx: These elements are managed by the ssl_ciphers directive, with ':' serving as separator, '-' used to disable and '!' to kill an element (e.g., -ELEMENT, !ELEMENT)
Mitigation.Missing: The following ciphersuites are not supported by the current OpenSSL version: {missing_elements}.
